meanings.definition: To annoy or pester someone persistently.
meanings.sent1: Stop nudzhing me to clean my room!
meanings.sent2: She keeps nudzhing her brother to share his toys.
meanings.sent3: The little dog was nudzhing the cat to play with him.
meanings.sent4: The dripping faucet was nudzhing her nerves like a persistent drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The buzzing mosquito was nudzhing her into a state of irritation.

meanings.definition: A person who annoys or pesters others persistently.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a nudzhing and keep asking the same question.
meanings.sent2: The class nudzhing always interrupts the teacher with questions.
meanings.sent3: The little nudzhing in the park kept following people around.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nudzhing, buzzing around her friends constantly.
meanings.sent5: The persistent nudzhing at work made everyone avoid him.
